### Here is the Documentation on the Challenge Infections

#### Infection intensity in tissue:

DNA Extractions and qPCR done with this protocols: 

**DNA Extraction:**
https://github.com/derele/Eimeria_Lab/blob/master/lab_protocols/DNA_extraction_tissue_protocol.Rmd

**qPCR from Tissue**
https://github.com/derele/Eimeria_Lab/blob/master/lab_protocols/qPCR_for_tissue_protocol.Rmd

**Column names**
1. death = day of death
  a. chal_8 = mouse sacrificed on the 8th day of the challenge infection
  b. prim_11 = mouse sacrificed on the 11th day of the primary infection
2. Eim_MC = Melting curve for eimeria
3. delta = delta ct value
